DOC.detailed_description: Chronic sinusitis is a very common problem. The functional endoscopic sinus surgery is a prevalent option to treat this disease.During usage of different techniques of surgery, the need for packing after surgery is debatable problem. Someone claimed packing is unnecessary and other one propose different material to packing after surgery. So to solve this problem this research has been designed.
